content:
I see that you've already made the first steps on your path to psychological improvement, that's great!

Today, I would like to introduce you to a new feature - the Daily State Assessment. I've included it in the list of recommended actions, as it's exceptionally useful for monitoring your progress.

I recommend filling it out daily before starting your activities. Otherwise, continue to keep a diary and familiarize yourself with the theory. Have a good day!
